name: Restaurant Cooking Management
description:
Hey Boys & girls! Do you know what it takes to be a master cooking chef? If no than its time to get a feel of opening a restaurant of your own, and serve the hungry customers, by becoming a master chef in Restaurant Cooking Management. Restaurant Cooking Management is a beautiful kitchen cooking games that tests your cooking, time management & serving skills as you have to serve the hungry customers & make them happy. Restaurant Cooking Management is an addictive simulation restaurant story game where you set off to play as a master chef by providing speedy service and delicious food in kitchen mania. You have to serve customers who visit your restaurant with quality food and speed in order to win popularity and earn money. Make customers happy by revealing the master chef inside you & write your own kitchen story.

In Restaurant Cooking Management, you have dozens of different dishes, desserts, appetizers, fast food and many more meals which make this the perfect kitchen restaurant game. So take command of the kitchen and demonstrate the skills of a master chef, all you have to do is gather up all the ingredients, cook food in the kitchen and fulfill the appetite of your hungry customers & make them happy. It is an addicting time management cooking game that features endless play. Take your cooking fever to a whole new level cook tasty food in kitchen, serve orders on time and make your customers happy. Never forget the Recipes as remembering food Recipe will provide speedy serving system to your clients. You can cook for multiple customers at a single time to improve your cooking skills within your cafe. So sharpen your skill as a master chef & manager: prepare, cook and serve mouth-watering menu items in each exotic restaurant. You can shop in store to upgrade all cooking items and appliances.

Features:
* Use your favorite recipes to prepare the orders & become the master chef in town.
* Cook and master appetizing world cuisine
* Fun filled, unique, challenging & exciting levels
* Speed up to serve food to all the people in time
* Run your own Restaurant with business strategy & Serve Customers
* Serve your finest cuisine to customers from all around the world.
* Receive coins from happy & satisfied diners
* Spend earned money to upgrade your appliances
* Serve delicious food to hungry foodies.

You can now live your dream of becoming a Master kitchen Chef and managing your own classy virtual kitchen & restaurant management. Take the crazy fate of restaurant in your hands keep your customers happy by cooking & serving piping hot dishes and collect tips.
